mapper.select: SELECT DTL.REQ_SEQ AS reqSeq , CMT.REQ_DTL_SEQ AS reqDtlSeq , CMT.REQ_DTL_CMT_SEQ AS reqDtlCmtSeq , CMT.REQ_DTL_CMT AS reqDtlCmt , HIS.REQ_DTL_STAT_CD AS reqDtlStatCd , FN_GET_CODE_NM('REQ_DTL_STAT_CD', HIS.REQ_DTL_STAT_CD) AS reqDtlStat , CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 OR LOGIN.USER_SEQ = CMT.REG_SEQ THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ownerYn , CMT.USE_YN AS useYn , DATE_FORMAT(CMT.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(CMT.REG_SEQ) AS regNm FROM TB_REQ_DTL DTL INNER JOIN TB_REQ_DTL_CMT CMT ON DTL.REQ_DTL_SEQ = CMT.REQ_DTL_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_REQ_DTL_HIS HIS ON CMT.REQ_DTL_SEQ = HIS.REQ_DTL_SEQ AND CMT.REQ_DTL_HIS_SEQ = HIS.REQ_DTL_HIS_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER LOGIN ON LOGIN.USER_SEQ = #{loginUserSeq} WHERE (CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE CMT.USE_YN = 'Y' END) AND CMT.REQ_DTL_CMT_SEQ = #{reqDtlCmtSeq}
